Title.evidence: We studied kidney transplant recipients experiencing rejection under belatacept-based early corticosteroid withdrawal following T cell depleting induction in a recent randomized trial (BEST Trial, clinicaltrials.gov # NCT01729494 )

Trial_Design.evidence: We studied kidney transplant recipients experiencing rejection under belatacept-based early corticosteroid withdrawal following T cell depleting induction in a recent randomized trial (BEST Trial, clinicaltrials.gov # NCT01729494 )

Intervention.evidence: everolimus (an mTOR inhibitor) treatment of patients with BRR halted the in vivo proliferation of T EM cells

Objective.evidence: to determine mechanisms of rejection and treatment

Result_Outcome.evidence: everolimus led to rapid resolution of rejection as confirmed by histology
